channel.title: Easy on Lane Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Easy on Lane Recipes

item.title: Mississippi Pot Roast
item.description: We’ve personally found the searing portion of this recipe to not be strictly necessary, and if you like onions then adding a bed of onions to slow cooker with the juices can add some additional flavor. But it’s pretty optional as well, and allows for the recipe to be pretty flexible on the prep time.
